Student: Ohio gunman targeted group in cafeteria

A teenager opened fire in the cafeteria at his suburban Cleveland high school today, killing one student and wounding four others before being captured. (AP)

Red Sox veteran Jason Varitek to retire

Catcher Jason Varitek, a two-time World Series champion and the captain of the Red Sox from 2005-2011, will announce his retirement, sources said. (Boston Globe)

Yarmouth police seek domestic violence charge against ex-candidate Mihos

Former gubernatorial candidate Christy Mihos is alleged to have pushed his wife of 38 years at their West Yarmouth home, a source said. (Boston Globe)

Search for missing BC student continues

Police used sonar today at the Chestnut Hill Reservoir as they searched for Franco Garcia who was last seen Wednesday morning. (Boston Globe)

29 Lynn English students disciplined after videotaped school fight between two girls

More could face disciplinary action as the city continues to investigate a fight that was refereed and videotaped by students, who did nothing to stop it. (Boston Globe)

Jan Berenstain, who with her husband, Stan, wrote and illustrated the Berenstain Bears books that have charmed preschoolers for 50 years, has died. She was 88.
